details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.2.2 Content streams
details.description: Content streams shall not contain any operators not defined in ISO 32000-2:2020 even if such operators are bracketed by the BX/EX compatibility operators.

rule.description: Content streams shall not contain any operators not defined in ISO 32000-2:2020 even if such operators are bracketed by the BX/EX compatibility operators.

error.message: A content stream contains an operator not defined in ISO 32000-2:2020
